poem:
### Lines in the Sand

New lines drawn in winter frost,  
leaders huddle under distant stars.  
Europe pauses, breath held;  
questions tug at sleeves—  
"Where does hope rest tonight?"  
In Ukraine, they count footsteps,  
measure borders in heartbeats,  
pencil thoughts like snowflakes  
melting quietly on gray horizons.
